reviews.title: Great Ukulele Simulator
reviews.comment: A great app, especially if you\'re just learning the positions for a song. Only bad thing is that there are occasionally times that it lags and messes with the flow of a song. Will give 5 stars once lag is fixed.
reviews.author: Katie Wyman

reviews.title: Just a Fun Concept
reviews.comment: This app is quite good, and can be fun. Although, i woulden`t recommend this app to people who want to learn the ukulele. I only find this as a fun app, and it could do with some improvements, for example more then 1-finger strumming.
reviews.author: Kai Saville

reviews.title: Not good
reviews.comment: When playing a song it does one string at a time like bum-bum-bum-bum and you can\'t play a g major chord.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Eh...
reviews.comment: Try playing this and then try playing a real uke... even if my phone were about half the width that it is now, the sounds really aren\'t that great. Overall: fun concept, probably won\'t use it
reviews.author: Christopher Kleinman

reviews.title: POS
reviews.comment: FROM THE START. THIS APP IS GREAT. AND THOUGH IT IS A GREAT APP. I\'D WANT TO MAKE A SUGGESTION.                            .ALSO A COMMENT. I AMEND SPEACH RIGHTS RESPECTFULLY. TO SAY. YOU SHOULD BE ABLE TO HOLD DOWN ALL CHORD KEYS Placements AT ONCE. YOU ONLY STRUM IN ONE SECTION ANY WAYS. THIS AHOULD BE MORE OF A STIMULATION. A CHALLENGE YOU CAN\'T REFUSE. BUT HOW WILL YOU MINIMIZE THIS BYTES FOR SUCH WITHOUT FLAWS. DECREASE MORE ON INFORMATION ABOUT IT. IT\'S AN ALL OVER USEFUL APP FOR ALL UKE BORNS.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Almost perfect
reviews.comment: I love this app because it gives me a chance to learn to play before I get my own uke. One thing is that I can\'t hold all four strings down to plat certain chords as it only let\'s me play 3 strings, other than that it\'s perfect!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: Works as it should for tablet no slide string
reviews.author: Kevin Rippetoe

reviews.title: Fun... But not to real strum
reviews.comment: Great for a uke player. But if you\'re a learner, don\'t expect this to be like the real uke.  It is for fun only.\342\231\252\342\231\245\342\231\245
reviews.author: Kayla Kilman

reviews.title: Hopeless.
reviews.comment: I used the settings to make the ukulele left handed and when I finished with the settings I went back to the ukulele and it was still right handed I also wanted to change the neck colour and it wouldn\'t work also the screen scaling is no good for 10\" tablets as the strings are too far apart please fix this.
reviews.author: Erin Sharp

reviews.title: Best one I\'ve found so far.
reviews.comment: I like it.  Solo is best for guitar.  Would like it better if it had a built in chord chart.
reviews.author: Jaydon Rose

reviews.title: Can only hold down one string
reviews.comment: If you hold down more than one string you can\'t strum :-(
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Poop
reviews.comment: Why is this useful in any way??
reviews.author: Michael Gordon

reviews.title: Sweet!
reviews.comment: Needs somtin,,,,,,  sliding up the threat with out the brakes,  :-)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Bad!!
reviews.comment: I hate it!!!
reviews.author: Nasuha Dhabitah

reviews.comment: Somewhere over the rainbow

reviews.comment: myukulele

reviews.title: Curious
reviews.comment: How to change ?
reviews.author: shanice tang

reviews.title: No more than 1 finger?
reviews.comment: It\'s actually a good overall app, but am I the only one who can only play the chords that only require 1 finger on a fret?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Unable to press more than 2 stringz. When you press 2 strings together. U wont be able to strum it
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: I work in a daycare and this little app keeps the kids interested.
reviews.author: A Google User
